thread.title: Martial: Man United Can Win EPL, Champions League Double
thread.title_full: Martial: Man United Can Win EPL, Champions League Double

author: Nurudeen Obalola
title: Martial: Man United Can Win EPL, Champions League Double
text:
Foreign , Headlines 
French teenager Anthony Martial has claimed he can help Manchester United to win the Premier League, Champions League double this season. 
The 19-year-old star has already scored four goals since his record £36million transfer from Ligue 1 side Monaco. 
Martial told French TV show Telefoot: “I think we can win the Premier League and the Champions League this season. Both of them. We are among the top five clubs (in Europe).” 
The former Monaco star, who will make his first start for France in the friendly in Denmark on Sunday, added: “It is going well so far. I have had a great welcome from the fans. I don’t think about my price on the pitch. 
“The goal against Liverpool, the big enemy of the club, allowed the fans to get to know me a bit better.”
